channel.title: Help with yell
channel.description: does anybody no how to add adminyell mod yell and coowner yell to yell system if i have one so players can use

item.title: Help with yell
item.dc:creator: @yarwin yarwin
item.description:
@yarwin wrote:

blacksabath:

ok i need a adminyell and modyell to work so incase players needs us and also i want it so they can yell to i have it so they can yell but i think with modyell and adminyell they wont beable to yell

I know this topic is extremely old, but I wanna help you out here.

You already have the modyell, if you want adminyell, you need to change:

(p.playerRights == 1)

into:

(p.playerRights >= 2)

But I assume you already know this, or you already found another hobby.
But still this might be usefull for other users looking for the adminyell command.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with yell
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

public void yell(String msg) { for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { Client players = (Client) p; players.sendMessage(msg); } } }

if(command.startsWith("yell")) { String[] msg = command.substring(Integer.parseInt(5)); String[] rights = {"[Moderator]","[Administrator]","[Owner]"}; yell(rights[playerRights]+" "+playerName+": "+msg); }

Read full topic

item.title: Help with yell
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("modyell") && command.length() > 8) { String text = command.substring(8); for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client) p; // specific player's client if (p.playerRights == 1) { castOn.sM(""+playerName+" Says... " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } }

Read full topic
